mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, BASIS_PRICE_SEQ, PRDT_STKN, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(PRDT_STKN) AS PRDT_STKN_NM, PRDT_ERQK_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(PRDT_ERQK_CD) AS PRDT_ERQK_NM, SC_AMT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_SD06D01 WHERE BASIS_PRICE_SEQ = #{basisPriceSeq} ORDER BY BASIS_PRICE_SEQ, PRDT_ERQK_CD, PRDT_STKN ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} AND #{lastIndex}

SELECT RNUM, BASIS_PRICE_SEQ, PRDT_SIZE, NVL(FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(PRDT_SIZE),PRDT_SIZE) AS PRDT_SIZE_NM, PRDT_ERQK_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(PRDT_ERQK_CD) AS PRDT_ERQK_NM, SC_AMT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM TB_SD06D02 WHERE BASIS_PRICE_SEQ = #{basisPriceSeq} AND PRDT_ERQK_CD = #{prdtErqkCd} ORDER BY BASIS_PRICE_SEQ, PRDT_ERQK_CD, PRDT_SIZE ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} AND #{lastIndex}
SELECT to_char(to_date(PRDT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PRDT_DT, PRDT_UPR, SELL_UPR, BASIS_PRICE_SEQ, PRDT_IMP_YN, PRDT_DIV FROM TB_SD06M01 WHERE BASIS_PRICE_SEQ = #{basisPriceSeq}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO TB_SD06M01 USING DUAL ON ( BASIS_PRICE_SEQ = #{basisPriceSeq} AND PRDT_DT = #{prdtDt} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PRDT_IMP_YN = #{prdtImpYn}, PRDT_DIV = #{prdtDiv}, PRDT_UPR = #{prdtUpr}, SELL_UPR = #{sellUpr}, UDT_ID = #{userId}, UDT_PGM = 'SD0602P01.html', UDT_DTTM = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PRDT_DT, PRDT_IMP_YN, PRDT_DIV, PRDT_UPR, SELL_UPR, BASIS_PRICE_SEQ, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM) VALUES (#{prdtDt}, #{prdtImpYn}, #{prdtDiv}, #{prdtUpr}, #{sellUpr}, TB_SD06M01_SQ01.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, sysdate, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, sysdate);

MERGE INTO TB_SD06D01 USING DUAL ON ( BASIS_PRICE_SEQ = #{basisPriceSeq} AND PRDT_STKN = #{prdtStkn} AND PRDT_ERQK_CD = #{prdtErqkCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SC_AMT = #{scAmt}, UDT_ID = #{userId}, UDT_PGM = #{pgmId}, UDT_DTTM = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (BASIS_PRICE_SEQ, PRDT_STKN, PRDT_ERQK_CD, SC_AMT, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM ) VALUES (#{basisPriceSeq}, #{prdtStkn}, #{prdtErqkCd}, #{scAmt}, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, sysdate, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, sysdate);

MERGE INTO TB_SD06D02 USING DUAL ON ( BASIS_PRICE_SEQ = #{basisPriceSeq} AND PRDT_SIZE = #{prdtSize} AND PRDT_ERQK_CD = #{prdtErqkCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SC_AMT = #{scAmt}, UDT_ID = #{userId}, UDT_PGM = #{pgmId}, UDT_DTTM = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (BASIS_PRICE_SEQ, PRDT_SIZE, PRDT_ERQK_CD, SC_AMT, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM, UDT_ID, UDT_PGM, UDT_DTTM ) VALUES (#{basisPriceSeq}, #{prdtSize}, #{prdtErqkCd}, #{scAmt}, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, sysdate, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, sysdate);

INSERT INTO GOLDMOON.TB_SD06D01 (BASIS_PRICE_SEQ, PRDT_STKN, PRDT_ERQK_CD, SC_AMT, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM) SELECT ( SELECT MAX(BASIS_PRICE_SEQ) FROM GOLDMOON.TB_SD06M01 WHERE PRDT_IMP_YN = #{prdtImpYn} AND PRDT_DIV = #{prdtDiv}) AS BASIS_PRICE_SEQ , PRDT_STKN, PRDT_ERQK_CD, SC_AMT, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE FROM GOLDMOON.TB_SD06D01 WHERE BASIS_PRICE_SEQ IN ( SELECT MAX(BASIS_PRICE_SEQ) AS BASIS_PRICE_SEQ FROM GOLDMOON.TB_SD06M01 WHERE BASIS_PRICE_SEQ < (SELECT MAX(BASIS_PRICE_SEQ) FROM GOLDMOON.TB_SD06M01 ) AND PRDT_IMP_YN = #{prdtImpYn} AND PRDT_DIV = #{prdtDiv} )
